attributes.action: Stop Killing Animals For Meat- Or Kill Them More Humainly!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i vow that animal killing is wrong no innocent living thing should lose its life for another- its like murder! I know many people love meat and wont do away with it which is why i have also put  to be killed more humainly if they have to  be killed! - so by changing the way they are killed for the better i think is a start!
